entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wainwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.1°C

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Light snow beginning this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
